rows.label: qev065206_MSG0001
rows.name: Any success in infiltrating the three sisters' quarters?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065206_MSG0002
rows.name: ...What? There's a barrier blocking your way?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065206_MSG0003
rows.name:
Hmm... I remember that security being in place when I
was still there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065206_MSG0004
rows.name:
You'll need to find three keys distributed between the
Definians and Milsaadi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065206_MSG0005
rows.name:
Though I doubt they ever dreamed they'd be invaded,
so you may find them just lying around nearby.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065206_MSG0006
rows.name:
In any case, once you obtain three, you should be able
to pass through that barrier to the sisters.[ST:wait ]
